channel.title: Npc's i need help, im going crazy :P
channel.description:
ok how do i do the folowing:
1. make a shop sell its items at a better price
2. make a shop buy some items at a better price
3. how do i add a kalphite queen that will transfer into its 2nd form
4. how do i modify what a monster drops
heres a few more random non-npc type questions.. maybe some
1a. if i have a castle wars, how would i put a portal leading to a new castle wars, into my old castle wars (thats just an e.g i actualy want my market place to have a new market place in it)
2a. how do i change the start look
3a. how do i change the old clients welcome thing to my own custom one
4a. How do i make a new area that i would like (for e.g the kalphite lair)
5a. how would i make leather craftable (blue, green, red, black are craftable but nothing else)
6a. how do i make a copy of another dungeon (portal leads to the dungeon) an exact copy
7a. why is there so many questions, am i dumb (dont answer this one please :P)
ok, please answer them as there asked, so like u would put (7a."answer here") that would help alot, remember, u dont need to answer every question just one would help alot!
thanks, and another thanks for taking the time to answer me, and help me in my 5 hours of need!!

item.title: Npc's i need help, im going crazy :P
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

question 4:
go to NPC drops.cfg
change the IDs for the monster drops to what ever you want.

and start look go into player.java… look for

//Giving the player an unique look
		playerEquipment[playerHat]=2637;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1712;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=3140;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=775;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1377;

it will look something like that. just change the IDs to what you want equipted. -1 is for nothing

Read full topic
item.source: Npc's i need help, im going crazy :P
